cm:configItem.cm:name: address
cm:configItem.cm:description: Address to which the service should connect.

cm:configItem.cm:name: bindingId
cm:configItem.cm:description: Binding to be used by the service.

cm:configItem.cm:name: transportId
cm:configItem.cm:description: Transport to be used by the service. If not specified, the transport will be determined by the form of the address.

cm:configItem.cm:name: handlerChain
cm:configItem.cm:description: Specifies the list of handlers to be used for the service. The list can contain a mix of logical and protocol handlers.

cm:configItem.cm:name: systemHandlerChain
cm:configItem.cm:description: Specifies the list of system handlers to be used for the service. System handlers are created along with the client binding and - unlike regular JAX-WS handlers - cannot be changed. Their relative position w.r.t to regular handlers remains the same throughout the lifetime of the binding.
